addoninfo.title: PM3.HD
addoninfo.author: Jezz_X (Team XBMC)
addoninfo.description:
PM3.HD (Project Mayhem III High Definition) was based on the design of the old default skin Project Mayhem III by Chokemaniac.
This skin was created as XBMC moved off the xbox platform onto PC's. People were wanting to use XBMC on High Definition TV in 720p and 1080p and it came to my attention that the old default Project Mayhem III skin looked great on the low resolution xbox but looked very blocky when scaled up to Hi definition. So PM3.HD was created to fill the gap for High definition users with our first official "stable" release of XBMC for Linux, OSX and Windows.
